string.text:
A customized example of the RD 706 by the American company Rifle Dynamics. RD is known for manufacturing high-quality AK rifles for a US market. Heavily modified with a mix of Western and Eastern accessories, it is found only among squads of the clandestine ISG.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]United States
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Rifle Dynamics

A built-to-order full-length 5.45 AK made by Rifle Dynamics. RD is known for manufacturing high-quality AK rifles for a US market. Heavily modified with a mix of Western and Eastern accessories, it is found only among squads of the clandestine ISG.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]United States
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Rifle Dynamics

A customized example of the 5.45x39 Quickhatch by the American company Rifle Dynamics. RD is known for manufacturing high-quality AK rifles for a US market. Heavily modified with a mix of Western and Eastern accessories, it is found only among squads of the clandestine ISG.

A customized example of the 7.62x39 Quickhatch by the American company Rifle Dynamics. RD is known for manufacturing high-quality AK rifles for a US market. Heavily modified with a mix of Western and Eastern accessories, it is found only among squads of the clandestine ISG.
